TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class TemplateControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService, System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
.class public auto ansi abstract TemplateControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public MustInherit Class TemplateControl Inherits Control Implements IFilterResolutionService, INamingContainer
public ref class TemplateControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IFilterResolutionService, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer

summary.span: 为 类和 类提供了一组基本功能。

span.span: Provides the class and the class with a base set of functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个抽象类，提供通用的属性和方法类和类。The class is an abstract class that provides common properties and methods for the class and the class. 新实例不直接创建。A new instance of the is not created directly. 类定义支持声明性数据绑定表达式的方法：The class defines methods supporting declarative data-binding expressions: - 使用涉及数据源，如简单的属性或表达式的数据绑定表达式的方法。Use the method for data-binding expression involving data sources, such as simple properties or expressions. - 使用进行分析和 XPath 数据绑定表达式进行求值的方法。Use the method for parsing and evaluating an XPath data-binding expression. - 使用方法用于对包含 XPath 表达式的数据绑定 select 语句。Use the method for data-binding against an expression containing an XPath select statement. 结果是实现一个节点集合接口。The result is a node collection that implements the interface. 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)和[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on data-binding expression, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca) and [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何派生一个名为控件`MyControl`从类并重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a control named `MyControl` from the class and override the method. 当`MyControl`初始化时，重写调用方法。When `MyControl` is initialized, the overridden method is called. [!code-csharp[TemplateControl_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_Sample1/CS/tempcontrol_samples1.ascx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TemplateControl_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_Sample1/VB/tempcontrol_samples1.ascx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当用户结束交易时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user ends a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册的自定义事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to register a custom event handler for the event. 因为是一个抽象类，此代码示例使用类，该类派生自类。Because is an abstract class, this code example uses the class, which is derived from the class. `Account` 是支持的类`Debit`操作，这是事务性的必须作为一个单元执行。`Account` is a class that supports a `Debit` operation, which is transactional and must execute as a unit. 如果在此操作期间引发任何异常，则事务将中止。If any exception is raised during this operation, the transaction is ended. [!code-csharp[TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction/CS/templatecontrol_oncommittransaction.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_OnCommitTransaction/VB/templatecontrol_oncommittransaction.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置从中解析和编译控件的文件的相对于应用程序的虚拟目录路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the application-relative, virtual directory path to the file from which the control is parsed and compiled.

value.span: 一个表示该路径的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时，它定义的文件控件驻留在一个目录以外的页处理请求，请使用属性以返回到的相对于应用程序、 虚拟路径。When the file that defines a control resides in a directory other than that of the page processing the request, use the property to return the application-relative, virtual path to the . 属性上设置中的虚拟路径上设置基于属性。The property is set based on the virtual path that is set in the property.

span.span: The path that is set is .

exception.span: 设置的路径不是基于根路径的路径。

span.span: The path that is set is not rooted.

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether themes apply to the control that is derived from the class.

value.span: 如果使用主题，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为派生自的控件启用主题类。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control that is derived from the class. 当属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录搜索要应用的控件外观。When the property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply. 如果用于特定的控件中的主题目录存在，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序级别资源存储在 App_GlobalResources 文件夹。Application-level resources are stored in the App_GlobalResources folder. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 应用程序中的资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265)。For more information, see [Resources in ASP.NET Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来访问名为一个字符串`GlobalResourceString1`从一个名为的全局资源`MyResource.resx`App_GlobalResources 文件夹中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to access a string named `GlobalResourceString1` from a global resource named `MyResource.resx` in the App_GlobalResources folder. `className`参数是`MyResource`不带.resx 扩展名。The `className` parameter is `MyResource` without the .resx extension. summary.span: 加载 。

span.span: Loads a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当容器控件中载入控件时，容器将引发所有添加的控件事件，直到它已经赶上到当前的事件。When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event. 但是，添加的控件不赶上回发数据处理。However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing. 对于添加的控件，以参与回发数据处理，包括验证，必须在添加控件事件而不是在事件。For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the event rather than in the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.Control LoadControl (string virtualPath);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.Control LoadControl(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public Function LoadControl (virtualPath As String) As Control
public: System::Web::UI::Control ^ LoadControl(System::String ^ virtualPath);

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 控件文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to a control file.

summary.span: 根据指定的虚拟路径从文件加载 对象。

span.span: Loads a object from a file based on a specified virtual path.

returns.span: 返回指定的 。

span.span: Returns the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该控件支持缓存，从返回的对象方法不是实际对象; 而是对象。If the control supports caching, the object returned from the method is not actually a object; rather, it is a object. 如果`virtualPath`参数是相对，加载的控件的路径是相对于的路径。If the `virtualPath` parameter is relative, the path of the loaded control is relative to the path of the . 当容器控件中载入控件时，容器将引发所有添加的控件事件，直到它已经赶上到当前的事件。When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event. 但是，添加的控件不赶上回发数据处理。However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing. 对于添加的控件，以参与回发数据处理，包括验证，必须在添加控件事件而不是在事件。For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the event rather than in the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将用户控件添加到 ASP.NET 页。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add a user control to an ASP.NET page. 在`OnInit`事件方法中，此页使用方法以编程方式创建页上的用户控件。In the `OnInit` event method, this page uses the method to programmatically create a user control on the page. 该方法将添加到控件属性Web 服务器控件名为`Placeholder1`。The method adds the control to the property of a Web server control named `Placeholder1`. 定义`MyControl`类，该类用于在此代码示例，请参阅。For the definition of the `MyControl` class that is used in this code example, see . [!code-csharp[TemplateControl_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_Sample1/CS/TempControl_Samples1.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[TemplateControl_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateControl_Sample1/VB/tempcontrol_samples1.aspx#3)]

span.span: The virtual path is or empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `content`参数包含用户控件 （.ascx 文件的内容）。The `content` parameter contains a user control (the contents of an .ascx file). 此字符串不能包含任何代码，因为方法永远不会导致编译。This string cannot contain any code, because the method never causes compilation. `ignoreParserFilter`参数允许类被忽略。The `ignoreParserFilter` parameter allows the class to be ignored. ASP.NET 分析器使用类以确定是否在分析时允许在页中的项。The class is used by the ASP.NET parser to determine whether an item is allowed in the page at parse time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是的一部分接口，这是特定于控件在设计器的环境中使用设备筛选器的方式。The method is part of the interface, which is specific to how a control uses device filters in a designer environment. 当分析或上下文外部浏览器请求，设计器的环境中保留控件提供一种方法，以确定是否通过指定筛选器并指定筛选器是否为特定的一部分影响当前控件设备筛选器层次结构。When controls are parsed or persisted in the designer environment outside the context of a browser request, the provides a way to determine if the current control is affected by a named filter and whether a named filter is part of a specific device-filter hierarchy.
